description: Linux-native video transcoding profiles optimized for live playback, streaming, and archival

live-h264-linux.name: live-h264-linux
live-h264-linux.description: H.264 for cross-platform live playback on Linux (QLab-like, Miccia Player, VLC)
live-h264-linux.use_case: Live event playback, streaming to networked clients
live-h264-linux.notes: Universal codec, good quality, widely supported on Linux desktop and ARM devices

live-linux-hevc-mkv.name: live-linux-hevc-mkv
live-linux-hevc-mkv.description: H.265 MKV for Linux live event playback (mpv, Linux Show Player, 5s keyframes)
live-linux-hevc-mkv.use_case: Linux live events with mpv/VLC, ProRes replacement for live playback
live-linux-hevc-mkv.notes: MKV container for better seeking reliability. GPU acceleration recommended (VA-API/VDPAU). CRF 20 for visually transparent quality.

standard-playback.name: standard-playback
standard-playback.description: H.264 for general-purpose playback on Linux (lower bandwidth)
standard-playback.use_case: Archive playback, streaming with limited bandwidth
standard-playback.notes: Optimized for smaller file sizes while maintaining good quality

stream-hd.name: stream-hd
stream-hd.description: H.265/HEVC for 1080p streaming (smaller file size, modern codec)
stream-hd.notes: H.265 codec; check client support before deployment (older players may not support)

stream-4k.name: stream-4k
stream-4k.description: H.265/HEVC for 4K streaming (higher quality, efficient compression)
stream-4k.notes: Requires modern ffmpeg with libx265; 10-bit profile for better quality

archival-lossless.name: archival-lossless
archival-lossless.description: FFv1 lossless codec for long-term archival on Linux (no codec licensing concerns)
archival-lossless.use_case: Long-term storage, digital preservation, legal archival
archival-lossless.notes: Lossless, royalty-free codec; outputs MKV container for maximum compatibility

archival-linux-mkv.name: archival-linux-mkv
archival-linux-mkv.description: H.265 10-bit MKV for Linux archival (ProRes 422 replacement, visually lossless)
archival-linux-mkv.use_case: Linux archival storage, ProRes 422 HQ replacement, professional preservation
archival-linux-mkv.notes: 10-bit color depth matches ProRes 422. CRF 18 for near-lossless quality. ~60-80% smaller than ProRes 422 HQ. Uncompressed PCM audio.

archival-prores-alt.name: archival-prores-alt
archival-prores-alt.description: ProRes HQ (if available) for archive with broad compatibility
archival-prores-alt.use_case: Professional archival, migration from macOS workflows
archival-prores-alt.notes: Requires ffmpeg compiled with libprores; check 'ffmpeg -codecs | grep prores'

web-compat.name: web-compat
web-compat.description: H.264 Baseline for maximum web compatibility (older browsers, mobile)
web-compat.use_case: Web embedding, maximum device compatibility, low bandwidth
web-compat.notes: Baseline profile ensures playback on even older browsers and mobile devices

fast.description: Fast encoding, trade some quality for speed (time-sensitive live playback)
fast.use_when: Live playback deadline approaching, acceptable minor quality loss

normal.use_when: Most use cases, good quality-to-time tradeoff

slow.use_when: Archival, maximum quality needed, encode time not critical
